items.name: rusty key
items.description: An old iron key, its surface corroded. It might open something ancient.

items.name: torch
items.description: A wooden torch soaked in pitch. Useful for dark places â€” if you can find a way to light it.

items.name: torn journal
items.description: Pages filled with frantic handwriting. Mentions something about a guardian deep underground.

items.name: ancient medallion
items.description: A heavy bronze medallion etched with runes. It vibrates faintly in your hand.

rooms.name: Abandoned Camp
rooms.description: Scattered tents and ash from a long-dead fire. The forest looms to the north, and a path winds eastward.

rooms.name: Overgrown Forest
rooms.description: Thick foliage blocks sunlight. Strange whispers echo around you. A crumbling trail leads south, and a stone archway to the west catches your eye.

rooms.name: Stone Bridge
rooms.description: A moss-covered bridge crosses a dark chasm. Beyond it, you see the entrance to an ancient structure.

rooms.name: Vault Antechamber
rooms.description: The air is cold here. Symbols on the wall glow faintly. To the north is a heavy door with a round indentation at its center.

rooms.name: Sealed Vault
rooms.description: You've entered a chamber untouched by time. Dust hangs thick in the air. You feel an overwhelming sense of power and dread.
